Jekyll + Vite.js

Documentation

Learn how to use Vite.js to manage assets in your Jekyll site.

  • Published on
    July 4, 2021

    Installation 💿

    Add this line to your site’s Gemfile:

    gem 'jekyll-vite'

    Then, run:

    bundle install
bundle exec vite install
    Read more →
  • Published on
    July 4, 2021

    Getting Started 💻

    Run bin/vite dev to start the Vite development server, and then restart your Jekyll server with bin/jekyll serve.

    Visit any page and you should see a printed console output: Vite ⚡️ Ruby.

    Read more →
